name: Domain Real Estate Agent
description: Specialized agent for real estate operations including property search, CRM management, and lead routing

skills.name: Property Search
skills.description: Search for properties based on user criteria like location, price range, property type, etc.
examples: Find 3-bedroom houses in San Francisco under $2M
Show me condos in downtown Seattle
Search for commercial properties in Austin

skills.name: CRM Management
skills.description: Manage customer relationships, leads, and property inquiries
examples: Add new lead for John Smith interested in downtown condos
Update client preferences for luxury properties
Track follow-up activities for recent property showings

skills.name: Lead Routing
skills.description: Route leads to appropriate agents and manage lead distribution
examples: Route high-value lead to senior agent
Assign new inquiry to available agent
Distribute leads based on agent specialization
